alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 9:33AM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Mississippi... Chickasawhay At Leakesville affecting Greene, Wayne and George Counties. For the Chickasawhay River...including Waynesboro, Leakesville... Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay At Leakesville. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, flooding of lowlands continues and some roads in low lying areas become cut off by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 21.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday was 21.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.0 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
